title: Backfire: Rosie O’Donnell’s Twitter poll on Trump’s impeachment doesn’t go her way
text:
Rosie O’Donnell started a Twitter poll Monday with a very simple question: Should Trump be impeached? We’re betting she’d hoped it would have gone the other way, but with 272,582 votes tallied, 58 percent said that hell no, the president shouldn’t be impeached.

should trump be impeached — ROSIE (@Rosie) October 1, 2019

Never Trumper Bill Kristol has a similar poll going … we’ll see if things work out better for him.

Waiting for this tweet to be deleted 😂😂 — Saladino for Congress (@JoeySalads) October 1, 2019

I love how when I voted an hour ago, the "hell no" vote was 13%. An hour later, it's 30%. And this is in a strong Leftist bubble! — YoSniper (@YoSniperGames) October 1, 2019

Well, ya know, bubbles pop. 🤷🏼‍♀️ So, can we all just get back to the fact that this is based on hearsay? Yea, about the basic rule of law… *sips coffee* 🤨 If Democrats want to lose the House in this debacle it’s certainly their prerogative. — Sinstar33 (Christin) ✌️😎 (@Sinstar33) October 1, 2019

🤣🤣🤣 That poll is quickly turning into another disaster for the Trump haters. Do the liberals every win going up against .@realDonaldTrump ?? I believe not. — 💀KG💀™️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️ (@KevBoat44) October 1, 2019

I bet Rosie deletes this tweet before the days end. — 💀KG💀™️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️ (@KevBoat44) October 1, 2019

Should Democrats in Congress stop wasting time on hail marry impeachment scams and start voting on bills that improve the lives of everyday Americans? — pH Balanced ☆☆☆ (@MAGAPILL) October 1, 2019

Who should be impeached? — Carpe Donktum🔹 (@CarpeDonktum) October 1, 2019

WHY ISN'T ROSIE IN CANADA??? — ⭐⭐⭐ Scott Kingsbury⭐⭐⭐ (@ScottKingsbury5) October 1, 2019

How’s your poll going @Rosie — just jeff (@76Jeff) October 1, 2019

Kinda reminds me of 2016 election… the liberals tried to set it up to get the results they wanted …. then the republicans showed up! — just jeff (@76Jeff) October 2, 2019

When the poll swings the opposite way you though it would @Rosie

😂😂😂 Keep voting fellow patriots!#Trump2020 #WalkAwayFromDemocrats pic.twitter.com/Lv90ZRkCjP — Ohio For Trump (@joshdill64) October 1, 2019

Twitter is not real life Rosie. The people elected this man whether or not you like him. We elected him because the elite class has become wholly corrupt. — Brett Haase 🌎🚀✨🤖💫 (@brett7three) October 1, 2019

When this poll is over will Rosie — ask the NSA: I made Fetch happen. (@ImDudeLiberty) October 1, 2019

This poll is almost as exciting as the 2016 election🤣🤣MAGA🇺🇸 — the real..J..R..M (@RealJRM1) October 1, 2019

Guess this poll didn’t work out as you planned… — Jerry Fair (@Fairmaniac) October 2, 2019

This is going just as you expected I'm sure — Dave Engelman (@Krazy_Boy_Fredo) October 2, 2019

Thanks for playing. — JARHEADMARINE1 (@jarheadmarine1) October 2, 2019

Backfired 😂 — AzNatyve 🤷🏻‍♀️🌼🌵♈️👣🔮☀️🌲 (@aznatyve) October 2, 2019

I cant believe you were that confident to put this poll out there. Maybe now you will realize the country is not only Hollywood & NY which is the most corrupt and immoral places on this continent. There ARE sensible hard working good patriotic Americans that make America great — Denise winsock (@denisewinsock) October 2, 2019

Related:
description: These polls never seem to work out for liberals.
